steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Place the cursor at the desired location where you want to insert the date.
Go to the 'Insert' tab in the Word ribbon.
Click on the 'Date & Time' button in the 'Text' group.
In the 'Date and Time' dialog box, select the desired date format from the available options.
Check the 'Update automatically' checkbox if you want the date to be automatically updated every time the document is opened.
Click the 'OK' button to insert the date at the cursor position.
